article.title: Ubuntu Help System
article.para: Welcome to your Ubuntu help system! This help system is your first stop for finding information about how to use any aspect of your Ubuntu system. Click on the appropriate section to find information
Introduction to Ubuntu - an explanation of the Ubuntu philosophy and roots.
Installing, Removing and Upgrading Software - install new programs, remove programs and keep your system up to date!
Using your Desktop - how to use the programs on your desktop PC, including Sound & Video, Internet and Office applications.
Configuring your desktop - change the look and feel of your desktop!
Setting up hardware - add and configure printers, graphics cards, digital cameras and other hardware.
Setting up Server Applications - run server applications on Ubuntu.
Securing your Computer - when and how to install extra security measures for Ubuntu
Finding more help - if you cannot find the answer here, get more help!
Contributing to Ubuntu - the Ubuntu project is open to all, find out here how to contribute to improve Ubuntu!
